module.name: connectivity_allocation_to_physical_network
module.keywords: module, functional network, allocation, physical node, routing, auto-router, network, hierarchy, node

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of allocating a set of connected functional network nodes of an arbitrarily hierarchically organised network to the physical realised or to be realised node within an interconnect module. This allocation establishes the basic network requirement for routing the connections of an interconnect module, either manually or by an auto-router.

inscope.li: the allocation of a functional network node to the physical network of an interconnect module.

outscope.li: the relationships among allocations of multiple functional network nodes.
